lines.text:
[as two female zombies approach him and Scooby-Doo]
Like... we're not looking for any ghoul-friends, are we, Scooby?

[trying to find Shaggy and Scooby]
I think we should split up.
Good idea!
I'll go with Beau.

[frowning]
Bad idea!

[after Shaggy and Scooby-Doo fall into the hole, Mojo the pig snorting at them from above]
Zoinks! How humiliating! Chased into a hole by 1/3 of a B.L.T.!
We wanted a curse on the pirates. To destroy them as they had destroyed our island. Our wish was granted. We became cat creatures and destroyed the pirates!
[In one brief scene, Morgan Moonscar was screaming upon seeing Simone and Lena approach after they turn into werecats]
Only afterwards, did we discover that invoking the Cat God's power had cursed us as well.
Over the years, boats continue to come to our island. One was full of spice traders who started a pepper plantation. The plantation flourished...

[continues]
At least, until the Harvest Moon.

[after a birthday surprise by the gang]
I've been working so hard lately, I completely forgot today was my birthday.
I hope you don't mind. I asked the gang to come along.
Freddie, it's the best birthday present ever. It'll be like old times.
What I need is a real, live ghost.
That's an oxymoron, Daph.

[to Shaggy and Scooby]
You don't let the gators eat you. I can't stand tourists! Now all your splashing chased Big Mona away!
Quit your grumbling, Snakebite. You ain't never caught that fish, and you ain't never gonna did!

[They seem cornered by Simone, Lena and Jacques, but they suddenly start to shriek in pain and disintegrate, Velma looks to the moon dial and sees the shadow is past the midnight alignment]
Looks like your nine lives are up!
[seconds later, they have totally disintegrated into piles of dust]
Solving mysteries was a lot more fun than selling them.
Sometimes, it became necessary for Lena to lure outsiders back to the island.

[angrily]
Just like you lured us!
I've had years of practice!
And those zombies are just the poor souls you drained! They were just trying to warn us so that we wouldn't suffer the same fate they did!
Pretty smart for a television reporter.
No wonder you became a reporter, that monster almost sliced you up like a pepperoni pizza.
Actually Chris, every time there seemed to be a monster, it was just bad guys in masks.
The Harvest Moon will soon reach the midnight point on this moon dial. And then, the ceremony will begin!
What ceremony?
You won't get away with this!
I've been getting away with it for 200 years!
[Simone suddenly turns into a werecat and grins as they gasp in horror]
At least, Shaggy and Scooby are still free, maybe...
I heard that, Fred! Those two simpletons? We didn't even bother making wax dolls of them. Waste of time and magic wax!
Just what do you intend to do with us?
Ah, it's simple. Every Harvest Moon, I must drain the life force from victims lured to my island, to preserve our immortality.
This is more haunted stuff than I really wanted!

[stepping in Shaggy and Scooby's path]
Going somewhere?
[lifts them off the ground]
What's the matter, cat got your tongue?
[laughs evilly before zombies attack him]
[Shaggy and Scooby are almost aged to death by the werecats but are saved and revert back to normal]
Like, I was beginning to feel like a raisin!

[Shaggy and Scooby get catapulted up out of the hole at the top of the room and then fall back in and land right in the arms of a Confederate soldier zombie, who makes a slight moan as Shaggy and Scooby gasp in terror]
Shaggy! The zombies are the good guys!
Like, are you out of your mind?
[they hop out of his arms and run off]

[referring to Shaggy and Scooby]
Now get these trespassing tourists of my boat. I've got fishing to do!
That's ol' Snakebite Scruggs. He think the bayou is his own private reserve. He don't like anyone in it!

[Scooby imitates an owl he sees out the window that turned its head by twisting his neck two times all the way around]
Like, quit bothering the wildlife, Scooby. How do I look?
[Scooby turns around to face Shaggy]
Am I gonna turn a few heads or what?

[his neck suddenly untwists rapidly, making his head spin a few times, then stops]
You ret!

[Daphne has knocked out a zombie and Fred tries to unmask it while she films]
It's the gardener.
No!

[tugs on the zombie's face some more]
It's the fisherman.
No!

[continues pulling]
It's the ferryman.
[pulls the zombie's head off]
Maybe it's... real?
[tosses the zombie's head away]
Yaaaah!
[Daphne catches the head then tosses it to Shaggy, who tosses it to Scooby, who then tosses it back at the zombie]
I, I told you it wasn't a mask!
It, it must be animatronic!
[the zombie gets up and screws his head back on]

[opens the kitchen cabinet after hearing Shaggy and Scooby scream from the kitchen to see them shivering in it]
Peppers, again?
Ruh-uh! Writing!
Writing? What writing?

[points to a wall where a ghost scratched "GET OUT" into it]
L-l-l-like, ghost writing! This place is haunted!

[Lena leads the Mystery Gang to a mysterious room at the end of an underground passage]
Looks like a place for voodoo rituals. But why don't we just ask Lena?
Lena? What are you talking about?
Her story about Simone being dragged by zombies wasn't true! I saw the footprints of Simone's heels. She wasn't dragged. She walked down that tunnel!

[turns a crank to open the roof where moonlight shines in and enters with a sinister look]
Very clever, Velma, but it's too late!
Here, have a biscuit.
[He holds a tray of biscuits in front of Scooby, who to Shaggy's surprise, picks up the tray and dumps all the biscuits in his mouth and eats them in one gulp]
Something tells me you're getting the best of this meal!
What do we have to lose? It's the best lead we've had all day!
And that Lena is kinda cute.
[Takes a bite out of one of his bénies with some of the frosting getting onto his upper lip]
Fred!
I just meant she'd be very photogenic for our statement. Mmm.
Right.
[holds a handkerchief in front of him]
Uh... wipe your upper lip, Romeo!
